comments.content: Sorry answer A not D!

@Lucav6 - You can't convert opportunity to quote out of the box in CRM. Can you please explain me on what basis you said its A not D. Answer is C and the reason is following -

Products that are added to the Opportunity are automatically added to any new quote created for the same Opportunity record. 

How to verify the above explanation?
1. Create new Opportunity and add product. (make sure the opportunity hasn't got any quote)
2. Create Quote for the Opportunity. The moment you click on create Quote, you will see that the product which you've created for Opportunity is automatically populated under Products grid.

choices.C: Create a new quote from the opportunity
choices.B: Create a new quote from the customer
choices.D: Create a new quote with the opportunity price list
choices.A: Convert the opportunity to a quote
